Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.21144865]HBV:inhibition of cell proliferation in HepG2.2.15 cells(EC50=3.0 ± 1.0 μM;EC90=10.9 ± 3.4 μM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: [Ref.21144865]No cytotoxicity was observed at 1mM of peptide concentration against HepG2.2.15.
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: The peptide can efficiently enter cells and inhibit the envelopment of HBV nucleocapsids and subsequent secretion of viral particles.

Literature.Title: Artificial recombinant cell-penetrating peptides interfere with envelopment of hepatitis B virus nucleocapsid and viral production.
Literature.Author: Pan XB, Wei L, Han JC, Ma H, Deng K, Cong X.
